entry.tran: 它的，他的，她的(用于表示某物属于某东西、地方、动物、婴儿等)
entry.def: You use its to indicate that something belongs or relates to a thing, place, or animal that has just been mentioned or whose identity is known. You can use its to indicate that something belongs or relates to a child or baby.

sentences.en: A monkey is very alert in its movements.
The rabbit seems to be very alert all its life.
